question: 人口
sourceMnemonic: The amount of people with mouths (that you have to feed) is the <vocabulary>population</vocabulary> that you have to feed.
sourceReadingMnemonic:
This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. Since <ja>人</ja> has two on'yomi readings, here's a mnemonic to help you remember which one to use:

Here at Tofugu, we measure <vocabulary>population</vocabulary> in <reading>jean</reading>s (<ja>じん</ja>). Each of us has just one pair of jeans, so if you know the jean count you know the population.
